price: Kalau (Yaṡrib) diserang dari segala penjuru, kemudian diminta kepada mereka supaya murtad 1207, niscaya mereka mengerjakannya dan mereka tiada akan menunda untuk murtad itu, melainkan dalam waktu yang singkat.
arabic: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا
footnotes: 1207.  Maksud "berbuat fitnah" ialah murtad atau memerangi orang Islam.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw dukhilat ʿalayhim min aqṭārihā thumma su-ilū al-fit'nata laātawhā wamā talabbathū bihā illā yasīran
